meta.content: Jeopardy Archive David Greenberg Sarah Edwards Andrew Pau Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7281.

td.p: David Greenberg, an attorney from Los Angeles, California
Sarah Edwards, a museum docent originally from Richmond, Virginia
Andrew Pau, an assistant professor from Amherst, Ohio (whose 1-day cash winnings total $32,401)

tr.td: A PASSION FOR FASHION
COUNTRY FACTS
TV WEAPON OF CHOICE
U.S. GOVERNORS
MUSIC RECORDING
"IN" THE PHRASE
